Package com.lukflug.panelstudio

Class FocusableComponent

java.lang.Object
com.lukflug.panelstudio.FocusableComponent
All Implemented Interfaces:
Component
Direct Known Subclasses:
BooleanComponent, CollapsibleContainer, ColorComponent.ColorButton, Container, EnumComponent, KeybindComponent, Slider, TransientComponent
public class FocusableComponent
extends java.lang.Object
implements Component
Base class for all components included in this library.

    • updateFocus

      protected void updateFocus​(Context context, int button)
      If the button is being pressed, update focus state to hover state and call handleFocus(Context, boolean).
      Parameters:
      context - the Context for the component
      button - the mouse button state that changed
      See Also:
      Interface.LBUTTON, Interface.RBUTTON

    • handleFocus

      protected void handleFocus​(Context context, boolean focus)
      Does nothing, called when the focus state changes due to a mouse event.
      Parameters:
      context - the Context for the component
      focus - the new focus state
